data.generators

Class PairedSphericGaussians

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.generators.PairedSphericGaussians
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataGenerator

    public class PairedSphericGaussians
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataGenerator
    The idea for this class was to have a generator capable of generating clusters of points that would not be entirely spherical. In particular, this implementation generates clusters that consist of paired overlapping Gaussian distributions. Additionally, there will be a difference in relative density between the two Gaussian generated volumes, so that the centroid would not be well centered. This makes for an interesting test-shape for clustering.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PairedSphericGaussians(float[] mean, float[] stDev, float[] lowerBounds, float[] upperBounds, float firstProb)
      The two subcluster means will be at mean - stDev/2 and mean + stDev/2.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PairedSphericGaussians

        public PairedSphericGaussians(float[] mean,
                      float[] stDev,
                      float[] lowerBounds,
                      float[] upperBounds,
                      float firstProb)
        The two subcluster means will be at mean - stDev/2 and mean + stDev/2. The proportion of elements in the two subclusters is governed by a biased coin toss.
        Parameters:
        mean - Float array representing float feature means.
        stDev - Float array representing float feature standard deviations.
        lowerBounds - Float array representing float feature value lower bounds.
        upperBounds - Float array representing float feature value upper bounds.
